author: By Joshua M. Epstein
title: Now, America Needs to Prepare for a Fear Contagion. Can We Handle It?
description: I’ve modeled how fear spreads and retreats, and makes diseases worse. Here’s what to expect with coronavirus, and how to get ahead of it.
